title: Theresa May – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Being Announced as the Next Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Theresa May, the Conservative MP for Maidenhead, on Twitter on 24 October 2022.
content:
Congratulations Rishi Sunak on becoming Leader of the Conservative Party.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations

  *[
  NICs
 ]: National Insurance Contributions
  *[UKTI]: UK Trade and Investment

  *[DfE]: Department for Education
  *[FSM]: free school meals
  *[RAISEonline]: Reporting and Analysis for Improvement through School Self Evaluation Online
  *[GSHA]: Grammar School Heads Association
  *[OSA]: Office of the Schools Adjudicator
  *[LACA]: Leading Association for Catering in Education

Rishi will provide the calm, competent, pragmatic leadership our country needs at this deeply challenging time. He has my full support.
